mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.category_id AS "category.id", c.name AS "lifeStyleCategory.name", a.name AS "name", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", p.name AS "parent.name", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.sort AS "sort", a.alpha AS "alpha", a.beta AS "beta", a.gamma AS "gamma", a.delte AS "delte", a.epsilon AS "epsilon", a.zeta AS "zeta", a.eta AS "eta", a.theta AS "theta", a.lambda AS "lambda", a.phase_id AS "phase.id", ph.name AS "phase.name", a.hierarchy_id AS "hierarchy.id", hi.name AS "hierarchy.name", a.persona_id AS "persona.id", pe.name AS "persona.name", a.motivation_ids AS "motivationIds", a.occasion_ids AS "occasionIds", a.item_category_ids AS "itemCategoryIds", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_life_style p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN mod_phase ph ON ph.id = a.phase_id LEFT JOIN mod_hierarchy hi ON hi.id = a.hierarchy_id LEFT JOIN mod_persona pe ON pe.id = a.persona_id LEFT JOIN mod_life_style_category c ON c.id = a.category_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_life_style( id, name, category_id, parent_id, parent_ids, sort, alpha, beta, gamma, delte, epsilon, zeta, eta, theta, lambda, phase_id, hierarchy_id, persona_id, motivation_ids, occasion_ids, item_category_ids, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{lifeStyleCategory.id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{sort}, #{alpha}, #{beta}, #{gamma}, #{delte}, #{epsilon}, #{zeta}, #{eta}, #{theta}, #{lambda}, #{phase.id}, #{hierarchy.id}, #{persona.id}, #{motivationIds}, #{occasionIds}, #{itemCategoryIds}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_life_style SET name = #{name}, category_id=#{lifeStyleCategory.id}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, sort=#{sort}, alpha = #{alpha}, beta = #{beta}, gamma = #{gamma}, delte = #{delte}, epsilon = #{epsilon}, zeta = #{zeta}, eta = #{eta}, theta = #{theta}, lambda = #{lambda}, phase_id = #{phase.id}, hierarchy_id = #{hierarchy.id}, persona_id = #{persona.id}, motivation_ids = #{motivationIds}, occasion_ids = #{occasionIds}, item_category_ids = #{itemCategoryIds}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE mod_life_style SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
